item.name: create SUT using the compilation provider

exec: // save the request ID as a global variable for later tests to use -- used as SUT ID

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"
         xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/"
         xmlns:oslc="http://open-services.net/ns/core#"
		 xmlns:oslc_auto="http://open-services.net/ns/auto#">

  <oslc_auto:AutomationRequest>
	<dcterms:title>analysis test</dcterms:title>
	<dcterms:description>analysis test</dcterms:description>
	<oslc_auto:executesAutomationPlan rdf:resource="{{compilation_provider}}/services/serviceProviders/A0/resources/automationPlans/0" />
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>sourceGit</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>https://github.com/od42/test.git</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>buildCommand</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>gcc -g TestEchoProgram.cpp -o my_echo</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>launchCommand</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>./my_echo</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
  </oslc_auto:AutomationRequest>

</rdf:RDF>

exec: pm.test("Response body should contain an AutomationPlan (id:0)", function () {
pm.test("AutomationPlan should contain a dcterms:title property", function () {
pm.test("AutomationPlan should contain a dcterms:created property", function () {
pm.test("AutomationPlan should contain a dcterms:modified property", function () {
pm.test("AutomationPlan should contain a <dcterms:creator property", function () {
pm.test("AutomationPlan should contain a analyser parameter definition", function () {
pm.test("AutomationPlan should contain a SUT parameter definition", function () {
pm.test("AutomationPlan should contain a executionParameters parameter definition", function () {
// save the request ID as a global variable for later tests to use
// get global variable to use in this test
pm.test("Response body should contain an AutomationRequest", function () {
pm.test("AutomationRequest should contain a executesAutomationPlan property", function () {
pm.test("AutomationRequest executesAutomationPlan should match the AutomationPlan with ID " + AutoPlanId, function () {
pm.test("AutomationRequest should contain the expected dcterms:title property", function () {
pm.test("AutomationRequest should contain the expected dcterms:identifier property", function () {
pm.test("AutomationRequest contain the expected dcterms:creator property", function () {
pm.test("AutomationRequest contain the expected dcterms:description property", function () {
pm.test("AutomationRequest should contain a dcterms:created  property", function () {
pm.test("AutomationRequest should contain a dcterms:modified  property", function () {
pm.test("AutomationRequest should contain a analyser input parameter", function () {
pm.test("AutomationRequest should contain the expected analyser input value", function () {
pm.test("AutomationRequest should contain a executionParameters input parameter", function () {
pm.test("AutomationRequest should contain the expected executionParameters input value", function () {
pm.test("AutomationRequest should contain a SUT input parameter", function () {
pm.test("AutomationRequest should contain the expected SUT input value", function () {
pm.test("AutomationRequest should not contain a producedAutomationResult refference property", function () {
// wait for the request execution to finish

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"
         xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/"
         xmlns:oslc="http://open-services.net/ns/core#"
		 xmlns:oslc_auto="http://open-services.net/ns/auto#">

  <oslc_auto:AutomationRequest>
	<dcterms:title>{{reqTitle}}</dcterms:title>
	<dcterms:description>{{reqDescription}}</dcterms:description>
	<oslc_auto:executesAutomationPlan rdf:resource="{{server_address}}/{{server_context}}/services/serviceProviders/A0/resources/automationPlans/{{AutoPlanId}}" />
	<dcterms:creator rdf:resource="{{reqCreator}}"/>
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>analyser</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>{{analyser}}</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>executionParameters</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>{{executionParameters}}</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>SUT</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>{{SUT}}</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
  </oslc_auto:AutomationRequest>

</rdf:RDF>

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"
         xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/"
         xmlns:oslc="http://open-services.net/ns/core#"
		 xmlns:oslc_auto="http://open-services.net/ns/auto#">

  <oslc_auto:AutomationRequest>
	<dcterms:title>analysis test</dcterms:title>
	<dcterms:description>analysis test</dcterms:description>
	<oslc_auto:executesAutomationPlan rdf:resource="{{compilation_provider}}/services/serviceProviders/A0/resources/automationPlans/0" />
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>sourceGit</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>https://github.com/od42/test.git</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>buildCommand</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>gcc -g TestEchoProgram.cpp -o my_echo</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>launchCommand</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>./my_echo_invalid</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
  </oslc_auto:AutomationRequest>

</rdf:RDF>

<rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"
         xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/"
         xmlns:oslc="http://open-services.net/ns/core#"
		 xmlns:oslc_auto="http://open-services.net/ns/auto#">

  <oslc_auto:AutomationRequest>
	<dcterms:title>analysis test</dcterms:title>
	<dcterms:description>analysis test</dcterms:description>
	<oslc_auto:executesAutomationPlan rdf:resource="{{compilation_provider}}/services/serviceProviders/A0/resources/automationPlans/0" />
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>sourceGit</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>https://github.com/od42/test.git</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>buildCommand</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>gcc -g TestEchoProgram.cpp -o my_echo</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>launchCommand</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>./my_echo</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
  </oslc_auto:AutomationRequest>

</rdf:RDF>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"
         xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/"
         xmlns:oslc="http://open-services.net/ns/core#"
		 xmlns:oslc_auto="http://open-services.net/ns/auto#">

  <oslc_auto:AutomationRequest>
	<dcterms:title>{{reqTitle}}</dcterms:title>
	<dcterms:description>{{reqDescription}}</dcterms:description>
	<oslc_auto:executesAutomationPlan rdf:resource="{{server_address}}/{{server_context}}/services/serviceProviders/A0/resources/automationPlans/{{AutoPlanId}}" />
	<dcterms:creator rdf:resource="{{reqCreator}}"/>
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>analyser</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>{{analyser}}</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>executionParameters</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>{{executionParameters}}</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>SUT</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>{{SUT}}</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
  </oslc_auto:AutomationRequest>

</rdf:RDF>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"
         xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/"
         xmlns:oslc="http://open-services.net/ns/core#"
		 xmlns:oslc_auto="http://open-services.net/ns/auto#">

  <oslc_auto:AutomationRequest>
	<dcterms:title>{{reqTitle}}</dcterms:title>
	<dcterms:description>{{reqDescription}}</dcterms:description>
	<oslc_auto:executesAutomationPlan rdf:resource="{{server_address}}/{{server_context}}/services/serviceProviders/A0/resources/automationPlans/{{AutoPlanId}}" />
	<dcterms:creator rdf:resource="{{reqCreator}}"/>
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>analyser</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>{{analyser}}</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>executionParameters</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>{{executionParameters}}</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>SUT</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>{{SUT}}</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
  </oslc_auto:AutomationRequest>

</rdf:RDF>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"
         xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/"
         xmlns:oslc="http://open-services.net/ns/core#"
		 xmlns:oslc_auto="http://open-services.net/ns/auto#">

  <oslc_auto:AutomationRequest>
	<dcterms:title>{{reqTitle}}</dcterms:title>
	<dcterms:description>{{reqDescription}}</dcterms:description>
	<oslc_auto:executesAutomationPlan rdf:resource="{{server_address}}/{{server_context}}/services/serviceProviders/A0/resources/automationPlans/{{AutoPlanId}}" />
	<dcterms:creator rdf:resource="{{reqCreator}}"/>
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>analyser</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>{{analyser}}</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>executionParameters</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>{{executionParameters}}</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
	
	<oslc_auto:inputParameter>
		<oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
			<oslc:name>SUT</oslc:name>
			<rdf:value>{{SUT}}</rdf:value>
		</oslc_auto:ParameterInstance>
	</oslc_auto:inputParameter>
  </oslc_auto:AutomationRequest>

</rdf:RDF>
